history.text: Hi
The movie we'll be discussing is John Wick, in which Keanu Reeves stars as an ex-hitman who goes on a path of destruction after assassins kill his dog.
Interesting, is a new movie?
No, it came out in 2014. Interestingly, Mr. Reeves did a majority of his own stunts for this movie and was deeply involved in learning firearms combat tactics.
One of the reasons this film reviewed so well was it's attention to detail in the firearms combat scenes.
Its a movie with purely action?
Yes, it's definitely an action movie through and through.
Does it have other famous actors?
Not really, a few lesser known names like Michael Nyqvist.
Has it won any awards?
The film currently holds a 86% freshness rating on Rotten Tomatoes with an average rating of 6.9/10
It has not.
What is the duration of the movie?
It's really one of the more innovative action films to come out in years. I don't have numbers for the duration, but I'd guess about 100 minutes.
If you enjoy well-choreographed action scenes, I'd definitely recommend it.
Can you tell me a movie similar to this one?
You might be interested in the Korean film "Oldboy", which has similarly well-choreographed fight scenes.
And while it's not really similar or in the same genre, I'd definitely recommend "Kung-fu Hustle", one of the funniest and best films to come out of China in some time.
Does John Wick have gore scenes?
No, although you do see people get shot and the movie in general is quite violent, I wouldn't say it's very gory at all.
Does it have a sequel?
It does, John Wick 2 was released just last year, although I haven't seen it yet.
It has scenes in many countries or just one?
Hmmm, hard to remember; most of the movies takes place in America.
Ok, I guess there's not trips during the movie. It involucrates mafia or gang groups?
Yep, the mafia, although I'm not entirely sure what involucrate means, but it seems like a fun word!
It is! It's like includes. John Wick is kind of a hero?
I'd also recommend any films by Tarsem Singh, one of my favorite directors, he has a really unique visual style.
Yes, he's the main protagonist of the film.
It's probably one of the better action films to come out in the past few years.
He has another mission, different than vengeance for the kill of his dog?
Oh yeah, they stole his car too, the bastards!
Does the film includes high tecnology such as robots or something related?
It's at this point I begin to wonder at what point this will end?
No, no robots, androids, or automatons.
I started wondering it too, but it seems I can finish the conversation now
Well, thats my time
Thanks and have a great day!
I'm interested of watching it, thanks to you!

uid1response.feedback: The user explained clearly why I should watch the movie, made a good definition of it and conviced me to watch it.
